analyzed: jñāyate iti jñānam sthira valam tasya maṇḍalam samūhaḥ trailokyam tad madhye mahā vajram svam mahāmudrā rūpam samādhāya adhi pati tvena sthāpayitvā sarva kāyeṣu sthāvara jaṃgameṣu khaṃkāram
tam kṛtvā kha vajra jñāna samaḥ bhavet
tri sattva ātmakaḥ ekaḥ syāt
kham iti prabhāsvaraḥ

original: tasya ca buddhaiḥ vairocanādisvabhāvaiḥ rūpaskandhādibhirbodhisattvaiḥ kṣiti- garbhādisvabhāvaiḥ cakṣurādibhirmuhurmuhuriti
analyzed: tasya ca buddhaiḥ vairocana ādi svabhāvaiḥ rūpa skandha ādibhiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ kṣiti garbha ādi svabhāvaiḥ cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ muhur muhur iti
rūpa skandha gata ityādi krameṇa pratikṣaṇam pūjyamānaḥ

original: jñānatrayātmake svasmin praveśyamānastridhā prajñopāyopalabdhasvabhāvena kalpyata iti trikalpaṃ jñānatrayaṃ tat samayati vilayaṃ gacchati yasmin tat trikalpasamayaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ taṃ tiṣṭhet
analyzed: jñāna traya ātmake svasmin praveśyamānaḥ tridhā prajñā upāya upalabdha svabhāvena kalpyate iti tri kalpam jñāna trayam tat vilayam gacchati yasmin tat tri kalpa samayam prabhāsvaram tam tiṣṭhet
tiṣṭhan buddhaiḥ api na dṛśyate iti
buddhāḥ trīṇi jñānāni

original: tairapi yathā na dṛśyate yathādarśanamanābhāsaḥ tathā tiṣṭhe- dityāha bhagavān khavajjrasamaya iti
analyzed: taiḥ api yathā na dṛśyate yathā adarśanam anābhāsaḥ tathā tiṣṭhe iti āha bhagavān kha vajjra samaye iti

original: khavatraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ tasmāt sameti udgacchatīti khavajjrasamayo mahāvajradharaḥ vakṣyamāṇakaṃ vyutthānasamādhi sūca- yannāha kāyetyādi
analyzed: khavatram prabhāsvaram tasmāt sameti udgacchati iti khavajjra samayaḥ mahā vajradharaḥ vakṣyamāṇakam vyutthāna samādhi kāya ityādi

original: kāyavākcittavatraṃ mahāmudrā tasyā antarddhānaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ tasmāt saṃbhavatīti saṃbhavaḥ vyūhaḥ sthiracalasarvabhāvātmakaṃ jñānakāyaṃ tasya mālā yathāśayaṃ vairocanādirūpeṇa pravṛttiḥ sā yasmin samādhau cittakṣaṇe sa tathoktaḥ
analyzed: kāya vāc citta vatram mahāmudrā tasyāḥ antarddhānam prabhāsvaram tasmāt saṃbhavati iti saṃbhavaḥ vyūhaḥ sthira cala sarva bhāva ātmakam jñānakāyam tasya mālā yathāśayam vairocana ādi rūpeṇa

original: svamantrapuruṣo tayapariśuddha- mahāmudrārūpaṃ vajramaṇḍalamadhyataḥ prabhāsvaramadhyādutthitaṃ dhyātvā tadanantaraṃ prākṛta- sattvānāṃ viṣayībhūtanirmāṇakāyaṃ parigṛhya prāṇāyāmāṅgabhūtamanāhataṃ hūṃkāra- vajrākhyaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā sthāpayitvā tadanantaraṃ raśmivibhāvanā kāryā
analyzed: mahāmudrā rūpam vajra maṇḍala madhyatas prabhāsvara madhyāt utthitam dhyātvā tad anantaram prākṛta sattvānām viṣayībhūta nirmāṇa kāyam parigṛhya prāṇāyāma aṅga bhūtam anāhatam hūṃkāra
daśa raśmayaḥ prāṇāyāme sthitā
teṣām vibhāvanā dakṣiṇa ādi bhedena praveśa ādi krameṇa pravṛttiḥ
hūm iti anabhilāpya anabhilāpya sūcakam

original: tasmāt samudetīti mañjuśrīsamayaḥ saṃbhujyate'vaivartikaviṣayī kriyate iti sa eva saṃbhogaḥ jñānasamayaḥ kāyaḥ taṃ prāpya kāyavākcittavajrāṇi nirmitakāya- vākcittāni tāni santi yasya sa kāyavākcittavajriṇaḥ vajrīti prāpte
analyzed: tasmāt samudeti iti mañjuśrī samayaḥ saṃbhujyate vaivartika viṣayī kriyate iti saḥ eva saṃbhogaḥ jñāna samayaḥ kāyaḥ tam prāpya kāya vāc citta vajrāṇi nirmitakāya vāc cittāni tāni santi

original: bodhiḥ paramārthaḥ sattvaḥ samvṛtisatyaṃ te ātmā deho yasya sa bodhisattvātmā
analyzed: bodhiḥ paramārthaḥ sattvaḥ samvṛti satyam te ātmā dehaḥ yasya sa bodhisattva ātmā
daśa bhūmayaḥ daśa raśmayaḥ
teṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
yaḥ nantara ukta krameṇa bhāvakaḥ saḥ evam saṃbhavet
ekādaśa paṭala ṣaṣ koṭi vyākhyā bodhisattva ityādinā samādhi samāpayati
satya dvayena parigṛhītam rūpam bodhisattvaḥ
tat ca jñānam saḥ eva samayaḥ
saḥ eva traidhātuka ācchādaka tvāt candraḥ sattva artha karaṇāt vajraḥ
tad niṣpādaka samādhiḥ api tathā ucyate
sandhyā bhāṣā

original: anantaroktakrameṇa nirmāṇakāyastha cakṣurādyāyatanaviśuddhidvāreṇa phalaṃ darśayitumāha, khadhātvityādi

original: ādau cakṣurgolakaśūnyīkaraṇena labdhaṃ yatsau- sīryaṃ tat khadhātuḥ
analyzed: ādau cakṣuḥ golaka śūnyīkaraṇena labdham yat sau sīryam tat kha dhātuḥ

original: tanmadhyagataṃ thlīṃkāraṃ jvālasuprabhaṃ sūryenduraśmibhiḥ dīpyamānaṃ asyante kṣipyante yenetyastraṃ paramāḥ śakrādividhnagaṇāḥ tadarthamastraṃ paramāstram tanniṣpannena cakṣurbhramaṇena sarvavighnavidhvaṃsanāt paramāstraṃ thlīṃkāraṃ taṃ vajra- kāyena kṣitigarbhasvabhāvena dhyātvā khavajrakāyasamo bhavediti
analyzed: tad madhya gatam thlīṃkāram jvāla su prabham sūrya indu raśmibhiḥ dīpyamānam asyante kṣipyante yena iti astram paramāḥ śakra ādi vidhna gaṇāḥ tad artham astram paramāstram tad niṣpannena

original: mahāvajradhara ivānantalokadhātusthitaḥ sarvabhāvān hastāmalakavat paśyet thlīṃ iti uktārtha- sūcakaṃ bījam
analyzed: mahā vajradharaḥ iva ananta lokadhātu sthitaḥ sarva bhāvān hastāmalaka vat paśyet thlīṃ iti ukta artha sūcakam bījam
kha vajra samayaḥ mahāvajradharaḥ

original: tasya vyūho mahāmudrā sā ālayaḥ sthānaṃ yasya kṣitigarbhasya sa khavajrasamayavyūhālayaḥ
analyzed: tasya vyūhaḥ mahāmudrā sā ālayaḥ sthānam yasya kṣiti garbhasya sa kha vajra samaya vyūha ālayaḥ

original: evamanantaroktakrameṇa vakṣyamāṇena ca divyacakṣuḥ śrotrādikaṃ bhāvayati yaḥ sa yogī pañcābhijñāsamo mahāvajradharatulyo jāyate
analyzed: evam anantara ukta krameṇa vakṣyamāṇena ca divya cakṣuḥ śrotra ādikam bhāvayati yaḥ sa yogī pañca abhijñā samaḥ mahā vajradhara tulyaḥ jāyate

original: buddhābhi- jñāgrasamayaiḥ buddhāḥ vyadhvavartino jināḥ teṣāmabhijñāgrasamayā divyanetrādayaḥ
analyzed: buddha abhi jñā gra samayaiḥ buddhāḥ vyadhva vartinaḥ jināḥ teṣām abhijñā gra samayāḥ divya netra ādayaḥ

original: idamiti yadanantaroktaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ sarvasiddhinā- miti
analyzed: idam iti yat anantara uktam divyam cakṣuḥ sarva siddhinā iti

original: sarve svaparayūthyāḥ teṣāṃ siddhināṃ buddhaṃ svacittaṃ tad yathābhūtamabhi- jānantīti buddhābhijñā mahāyoginaḥ
analyzed: sarve sva para yūthyāḥ teṣām siddhinām buddham sva cittam tat yathābhūtam abhi jānanti iti buddha abhijñāḥ mahāyoginaḥ
teṣām agra sādhanam sarva siddhīnām api pradhāna sādhanam

original: taṃ bhāvayitvā niṣpādya khadhātumadhyagataṃ śrotrasthānabhāvitaprabhāsvara- madhyagataṃ jñānaṃ vajrapāṇiḥ tanniṣpādakamoṅkāraṃ jñānoṅkāraṃ bhāvayet
analyzed: tam bhāvayitvā niṣpādya kha dhātu madhya gatam śrotra sthāna bhāvita prabhāsvara madhya gatam jñānam vajrapāṇiḥ tad niṣpādakam oṅkāram jñāna uṅkāram bhāvayet

original: tasya sādhanena tanmayīkaraṇena trivajrākṣobhyo mahāvajradharaḥ anantalokadhātu sthita vividhaśabdānāṃ śrotravilapatitaikaśabdavat grahaṇena tatsamatvāt trivajrākṣobhyasamo bhavati yogītyāha bhagavānakṣobhyavajro mahāvajradharaḥ
analyzed: tasya sādhanena tanmayīkaraṇena tri vajra akṣobhyaḥ mahā vajradharaḥ ananta lokadhātu vividha śabdānām grahaṇena tad sama tvāt tri vajra akṣobhya samaḥ bhavati yogī iti āha bhagavān akṣobhya

original: mahāvajradharatulyakāyaḥ tathaivāprākṛtavākcittadhāra- ṇāt vākcittāgradhṛk sadā sarvakālaṃ sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu pūjyate akṣobhyavajriṇeti śrotrasthena vajrapāṇinā pūjyate sevyate
analyzed: mahā vajradhara tulya kāyaḥ tathā eva aprākṛta vāc citta dhāra vāc citta agradhṛk sadā sarvakālam sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu pūjyate akṣobhya vajriṇā iti śrotra sthena vajrapāṇinā pūjyate sevyate

original: akṣobhyasamayo'kṣobhyaḥ tasmāt saṃbhavatīti akṣobhyasamayābhisaṃbhavo vajra- pāṇiḥ

original: trivajra- keturmahāvajradharo'nekalokadhātusthitagandhagrahaṇena tatsamo bhavet ityāha bhagavān ratnaketuvajro mahāvajradharaḥ
analyzed: trivajra ketuḥ mahā vajradharaḥ neka lokadhātu sthita gandha grahaṇena tad samaḥ bhavet iti āha bhagavān ratnaketu vajraḥ mahā vajradharaḥ
kāya ityādi

original: bodhinairātmyaṃ prabhāsvaram tatra jñānaṃ catuḥśūnyātmakaṃ mahāvajradhararūpam
analyzed: bodhi nairātmyam prabhāsvaram tatra jñānam catur śūnya ātmakam mahā vajradhara rūpam

original: tena samamālayaṃ śarīraṃ yasya sa vodhinairātmyajñānaguhyasamālayaḥ sādhakaḥ ratnasamayaḥ

original: triprakāro gandha[:] saṃbhujyate anubhūyate yena sa ratnasamayasaṃbhogavajraḥ ākāśagarbhaḥ

original: pūrvavanmahāmudrārūpaṃ niṣpādya tasmin jihvāpradeśe lokā- nāmīśvaro bhūtakoṭistatprabhāvitvā[t] dharmo lokeśvaraḥ tannivartaka oṃkāro dharma oṃkāraḥ taṃ bhāvayet
analyzed: pūrvavat mahāmudrā rūpam niṣpādya tasmin jihvā pradeśe dharmaḥ loka īśvaraḥ tad nivartakaḥ oṃkāraḥ dharmaḥ oṃkāraḥ tam bhāvayet
trivatra ityādi

original: trivajraṃ trividho rasaḥ taṃ sameti gacchatīti trivajra- samayo lokeśvaraḥ
analyzed: trivajram trividhaḥ rasaḥ tam sameti gacchati iti trivajra samayaḥ loka īśvaraḥ

original: tasya dhyānena taddvāreṇa trividharasānubhāvanāt trivajrāmito mahāvajradharaḥ daśadiglokadhātuparyāyaṃ navarasānubhavanena tatsamo bhavet ityāha bhagavānamitavajraḥ

original: ya evamālambayati, bhavet sa kāyādīnāmamitāyuḥ samatejāḥ

original: tadartha upāyo yasya sa mahāyānapathodayo bhavet

original: amitaguṇo mahāvajradharaḥ tasmin traidhātukasthitasarvarasānāṃ jihvendriyasthai- ekādaśapaṭalaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyā

original: karasavat grahaṇena prabhā sā śobhamānā śrīryasya so'mitaguṇaprabhāśrīḥ lokeśvaraḥ |
analyzed: grahaṇena prabhā sā śobhamānā śrīḥ yasya saḥ mita guṇa prabhā śrīḥ loka īśvaraḥ

original: pūrvavadādiyogaṃ kṛtvā samaya oṃkāraṃ prabhāvitvā vajro tpalaṃ prabhāvayedityāmnāyaḥ samayaḥ sarvanivaraṇaviṣkambhī tanniṣpādakaṃ vījaṃ samaya oṃkāraḥ sparśendristhāne prabhāsvaraśodhanapūrvakaṃ tatsamaya oṃkāraṃ prabhā- vitvā vajramevotpalaṃ mukulākāratvād vajrotpalaṃ taṃ prabhāvayet |

original: | trivajñaṃ trividhaṃ sparśaṃ tat sameti gacchatīti trivajrasamayaḥ |

original: tasya dhyānena trivajro'moghasiddhiḥ aparyantalokadhātusthitā- nekasparśānāmekamudrāpadmagatasparśavajravadanubhavanena tatsamo bhavet

original: śrīḥ paramānandasukhaṃ tadasyāstīti śrīmān sarvasattvānāmarthaḥ sarvasattvārthaḥ |

original: | tasya cakṣuḥsthāne vairocanavatraṃ prabhāvitvā trikāya oṃkāraṃ prabhā- prabhāvitvā trikāya oṃkāraṃ vairocanavajraṃ prabhāvayedityānupūrvyā yogaḥ |
analyzed: tasya cakṣuḥ sthāne vairocana vatram prabhāvitvā trikāye oṃkāram prabhā prabhāvitvā trikāye oṃkāram vairocana vajram prabhāvayet iti ānupūrvyā yogaḥ

original: trikāyo vairocanaḥ tanniṣpādaka oṃkāraḥ trikāya oṃkāraḥ |

original: taṃ cakṣurgolake bhāvayitvā tatparāvṛttyā vairocanameva cakṣurindriyasvarūpeṇa tāvat

original: || trivajraṃ trividharūpaṃ cakṣurindriyasvabhāvena sametyālambayatīti trividhavajra- samayo vairocanaḥ |
analyzed: tri vajram trividha rūpam cakṣuḥ indriya svabhāvena sametya ālambayati iti trividha vajra samayaḥ vairocanaḥ

original: tasya cakṣurbhāvena dhyānena trivajjravairocanamahāvajradharaḥ pūrvavat tatsamo bhavet

original: evaṃ bhāvayati yaḥ sādhakaḥ sa kāyādivajreṇa vairocanasamaprabhaḥ vairocanasamānatejāḥ jñānasvarūpeṇa jñānamūrtitvena saṃbudhyate guhyasamājapradīpodyotane jñāyata iti jñānasaṃbodhiḥ trikāyabhedyaṃ mahāvajradharapadaṃ tat sādhayatīti trikāyā- bhedyasādhakaḥ sa sādhako bhavet

original: | kāyavākcittatattvenālambyate gṛhyata iti kāyavākcittālamvanaṃ mahā- vajradhararūpaṃ tasya cakṣurindriyasthāne sthitvā trividhaṃ rūpaṃ saṃbudhyate jānātīti saṃbodhiḥ |
analyzed: kāya vāc citta tattvena ālambyate gṛhyate iti kāya vāc citta ālambanam mahā vajradhara rūpam tasya cakṣuḥ indriya sthāne sthitvā trividham rūpam saṃbudhyate jānāti iti saṃbodhiḥ

original: rāgaḥ strīpuruṣāṇāmanyonyasyāsaktiḥ saṃhatatvād vajraṃ tadudbhavān tadutthāpito vācaṃ vāṇīṃ kāyavākcittasaṃsthitāṃ kāyādisaundaryapatitāṃ vācaṃ śrutvā sarvān tān rāgiṇaḥ rāgodadhiramitābhaḥ tasya padaṃ rāgapariśuddhiḥ tasmin sthāpayitvā yā bhāvanā yoginaḥ sa rāgajāpa iti smṛtaḥ // dveṣaḥ sattvābhidrohaḥ tadeva vajraṃ tadantargataṃ cittaṃ kāyavākcittasaṃsthitaṃ kāyādiviṣayaṃ jñātvā sattvānveṣiṇaḥ dveṣaḥ akṣobhyaḥ tasyālayaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ tasmin saṃsthāpya kṛtaṃ yat parijñānaṃ sa dveṣajāpaḥ trivajrasamayo mahāvajradharaḥ tasya tattvaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ samayavajriṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ madhyaṃ hṛdayabhūtaṃ tadeva samaya- vajrāṇāṃ sādhakānāṃ napuṃsakajāpo niḥsvabhāvajāpa ityucyate

mantram sādhya nāma sahitam likhet japan vā vajra bhāṣayā iti vajra bhāṣā krodha vāc tayā saṃgīti kāraḥ mahā vajradharaḥ evam āha iti atha ityādi bhagavān mahā vajradharaḥ yathā yathā duṣṭa bhāvam gatāḥ tathā tathā niṣedhya tvam gatāḥ sādhyāḥ teṣām kāya vāc citta nibandhanam tadīyakam bījam kīlaya kīlaya niścalī kuru sarva pāpān pāpa adhyāśayān phaṭ bhedanam hū hū tattva codanam vajra kīla iti kṛtyena āmantraṇam vajradharaḥ ājñāpayati iti vajradharaḥ eva vidhim āha abhicāruka dravyaiḥ sādhya pratikṛtim kṛtvā karpaṭe viṣādinā nāma ālikhya puttalikā hṛdaye nidhāya mānuṣa asthi khadira sārāḥ dīnām anyatama kīlam ūrdhvatas krodha rūpam ayaḥ daśa krodhān utsārya diś vidikṣu sthāpayitvā tri vajjrakāya paryantam vyātmakam vimbam sumbha rūpam dhyātvā prayojayet anantara uktam kīlana vidhi dhyānena kuryāt na kevalam akṣobhya rūpeṇa iti āha

original: khadhāturākāśadhātuḥ madhyagataṃ yasmin maṇḍale caturasramiti catasro'srāḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvā locanādayo yasmin taṃ caturasraṃ kāyamaṇḍalaṃ suśobhanamaprākṛtaṃ cintet dhyāyāt |

original: vajramaṇḍalamakṣobhyamaṇḍalaṃ tasmin devatāvinyāsakramo dhyānaṃ tena vajra- maṇḍaladhyānena sarvacakriṇāṃ māṇḍaleyānāmāsanasthāpanaṃ kāryam
analyzed: vajra maṇḍalam akṣobhya maṇḍalam tasmin devatā vinyāsa kramaḥ dhyānam tena vajra maṇḍala dhyānena sarva cakriṇām māṇḍaleyānām āsana sthāpanam kāryam

original: evaṃ sādhāraṇa- kāyamaṇḍalaṃ vibhāvya karaṇīyamāha pūjāmityādi |

original: svacaryācāriṇaḥ svapadaṃ pātayati prāpayatīti ācāryo mahāvajradharaḥ taṃ hṛdaye hṛtpuṇḍarīke yathāvat dhyātvābhiṣekaṃ mānasaṃ samācaret kuryāt |
analyzed: svacaryā cāriṇaḥ sva padam pātayati prāpayati iti ācāryaḥ mahā vajradharaḥ tam hṛdaye hṛd puṇḍarīke yathāvat dhyātvā abhiṣekam mānasam samācaret kuryāt

original: khadhātuṃ dharmodayaṃ sarvabuddhaiścittamaṇḍalavat saṃsthitaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ vibhāvya tanmadhye'bhi- ṣicyamānaṃ śiṣyaṃ vibhāvayet dhyāyāt ||

original: tadanantaraṃ sarvān vairocanādīn buddhavodhisattvān tribhirabhiṣekapadaiḥ omityādyakṣaratritayaiḥ prāṇāyāmasthitaiḥ pātayet śiṣyaśirasi bodhicitta- vajratvamāpannān pātayet patitān dhyāyāt |

abhiṣeka anuśaṃsām āha anena ityādi

original: anenābhiṣekakaraṇenābhiṣiktaḥ śiṣyaḥ sarvasattvānugrahayogyān bodhi pratiṣṭhita- nirvāṇameti parārthe saṃpat tasyaiva dṛṣṭadharme sarvasiddhimahādbhutamiti |

original: sarva- guhyasamājapradīpodyotana siddhayo daśabalādayo buddhaguṇāḥ tairmahādbhutamatiśayaprāptaṃ kāyavākcittaṃ sidhyate siddhimupagacchatīti svārthasaṃpat |

original: sarvabuddhabodhisattvāḥ vairocanādayaḥ kṣitigarbhādayaśca yathāvat samaya- mekībhāvaṃ gacchanti yasmin dhyānenaiva yanniṣpādyate prabuddhajanābhiṣekārthaṃ tadabhedyaṃ dhyānamaṇḍalamiti ||

śākya vaṃśa utpannānām tilaka bhūta tvāt saṃbuddha vaṃśa tilakaḥ
athavā kṛtyā anuṣṭhāna jñāna svabhāvena sakala jagat artha karaṇa tvāt saṃbuddha vaṃśa tilakaḥ
sva para vibhāga upalambha rahita tve pi sattveṣu anukampaka tvāt sama tā

original: evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭo guṇanidhiṃ vahuratnabhūtāṃ māṃ kāmāhi bhajasva |
analyzed: evaṃguṇa viśiṣṭaḥ guṇa nidhim vahu ratna bhūtām mām bhajasva

original: yasmāt rāgavirāgamadhyarāgaprabhāsvarajñānotpādikeyamiti ātmānaṃ praśaṃsayati yadīcchase jīvitaṃ mañjunātheti |
analyzed: yasmāt rāga virāga madhyarāga prabhāsvara jñāna utpādikā iyam iti ātmānam praśaṃsayati yadi icchase jīvitam mañjunātha iti
rāga dveṣa moha viśuddhaya apāyena vajra sattva āyuḥ jī vita dānaiḥ vijayasva iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: evaṃ caturbrahmavihārasvabhāvairdevībhiḥ saṃcodyamānaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānāpravandha- sāmarthyāt śūnyatāyogāt vyutthāya śrīsuratasukharāgacaritapradarśanāya āliṅganacumvanabhūṣaṇapulakatā ḍanadaṃśananakhadānamardanadolāsūcīgrāmyādikaraṇamo- hanatayā pracalitamuktāhāravalayakaṭakakeyūranūpuraravaviṣayendriyavajrapadmasamāyoga- prajñopāyasamāpattyālikālimadanāt yatra kūrmakaṇṭhapūrṇaśaśāṅkanāḍītrayatyaṅgulica- lanāpracodanena ratimāyādhvaninā paramānandasukhamāsvādya skandhadhātvāyatanasvabhā- vān sarvatathāgatān mastakādārabhya nirjharadhārākāreṇa drāvayitvā sravati bodhi- cittasvabhāvena dharmodayamadhye saṃsthāpya tena dveṣādicaritasattvaṃ viśodhanāya maṇḍala- cakramutsṛjya punarapi prabhāsvaraṃ praviśya nirvikalpatāṃ gataḥ |
analyzed: evam catur brahmavihāra svabhāvaiḥ devībhiḥ saṃcodyamānaḥ pūrva praṇidhāna a pravandha sāmarthyāt śūnyatā yogāt vyutthāya śrī surata sukha rāga carita pradarśanāya āliṅgana cumvana bhūṣaṇa mastakāt ārabhya nirjhara dhārā ākāreṇa drāvayitvā sravati bodhi citta svabhāvena dharma udaya madhye saṃsthāpya tena dveṣa ādi carita sattvam viśodhanāya maṇḍala cakram utsṛjya punar api

original: guhyasamājapradīpodyotane imamarthameva dyotayannāha atha bhagavān vajrapāṇistathāgataḥ sarvakāmopa- bhogaśriyaṃ nāma samādhi samāpannaḥ tāṃ sarvatathāgatadayitāṃ samayacakreṇa kāmayan tūṣṇīmabhūditi |
analyzed: guhya samāja pradīpa udyotane imam artham eva dyotayan āha atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ tathāgataḥ sarva kāma upa bhogaśriyam nāma samādhi samāpannaḥ tām sarva tathāgata dayitām samayacakreṇa kāmayan

original: sarvakāmā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ teṣāmupabhogaḥ svabhāvaparijñānena cakṣurādibhiḥ saṃpuṭīkaraṇaṃ tasya śrīsamatānandasukhenāvasthānaṃ yasmin tannāmakaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ prāptaḥ san tathāgatādhipatiḥ tāṃ sarvatathāgatadayitāṃ locanā- disvarūpāṃ samayacakreṇa virocanādisvabhāvena kāmayan ramayan tūṣṇīmabhūt deśanādivyāpārarahitaḥ jñānamudrayā saha samāpattyā sthitavāniti yāvat |
analyzed: sarva kāmāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ teṣām upabhogaḥ svabhāva parijñānena cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ saṃpuṭīkaraṇam tasya śrī samatā ānanda sukhena avasthānam yasmin tad nāmakam samādhim samāpannaḥ

original: atha bhagavantaḥ jñānamudrāsamāpattyanantaram ayaṃ sarvākāśadhātuḥ sarvatathāgata- kāyavākcittasamayacakreṇa paripūrṇavajrodakakumbha iva sthito'bhūditi |
analyzed: atha bhagavantaḥ jñāna mudrā samāpatti anantaram ayam sarva ākāśa dhātuḥ sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta samaya cakreṇa paripūrṇa vajra udaka kumbhaḥ iva sthitaḥ bhūt iti

original: ayaṃ gaganakuharaḥ vajradhārātmakaḥ trivajjrasaṃyuktavairocanāditathāgatasamūhena paripūrṇaḥ tilaśimvikāvannirantara san vajrodakakumbha iva paramānandakalaśavat sthitaḥ niścalo'bhūdityarthaḥ |
analyzed: ayam gagana kuharaḥ vajra dhārā ātmakaḥ tri vajjra saṃyukta vairocana ādi tathāgata samūhena paripūrṇaḥ san vajra udaka kumbhaḥ iva paramānanda kalaśa vat sthitaḥ niścalaḥ bhūt iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ bhagavati samāpanne sattvārthakṛtyarthaṃ darśayannāha athāsmin vajrākāśa- dhātau ye sattvāḥ trikāyasaṃbhūtāḥ te vajraśriyeṇa spṛṣṭāḥ sarve te tathāgatāṃ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ trivajrajñānino'bhūvanniti |
analyzed: evam bhagavati samāpanne sattva artha kṛti artham darśayan āha atha asmin vajra ākāśa dhātau ye sattvāḥ tri kāya saṃbhūtāḥ te vajra śriyeṇa spṛṣṭāḥ sarve te tathāgatām arhantaḥ
asya ayam arthaḥ

original: vajrākāśa- dhātau tribhuvane ye sattvāḥ trikāyasaṃbhūtāḥ trivajjrasvabhāvā vajraśriyeṇa mahāvajra dharasaukhyena spṛṣṭā viṣayīkṛtāḥ sarve tathāgatatvaṃ prāptāḥ trivajro mahāvajradharaḥ tasya jñānāni daśavalavaiśāradyādīni anubhavanti sma |
analyzed: vajra ākāśa dhātau tribhuvane ye sattvāḥ tri kāya saṃbhūtāḥ tri vajjra svabhāvāḥ vajra śriyeṇa mahā vajra dhara saukhyena spṛṣṭāḥ viṣayīkṛtāḥ sarve tathāgata tvam prāptāḥ trivajraḥ
tatas prabhṛti iti

original: vajraṃ raśmyabhiṣekādārabhya sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittaira- bhiṣiktāḥ santaḥ samantabhadrāḥ samanta[to] bhadrā ityabhūtārthanāmakā abhūvan |
analyzed: vajram raśmi abhiṣekāt ārabhya sarva tathāgata kāya vāc cittaiḥ a bhiṣiktāḥ santaḥ samantabhadrāḥ bhadrāḥ iti abhūta artha nāmakāḥ abhūvan

original: evaṃ sarvasattvān jñānābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya sattvasamatāpradarśanena yathābhilaṣati tad darśayannāha atha vajrapāṇistathāgata: tān sarvatathāgatānevamāha dṛṣṭā bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvadharmasamatāḥ atha te sarvatathāgatā vajrapāṇi sarvatathāgatādhipatimevamāhuḥ dṛṣṭā bhagavan dṛṣṭā sugata sarvatathāgatavajjrajñāna- caryeti |
analyzed: evam sarva sattvān jñāna abhiṣekeṇa abhiṣicya sattva samatā pradarśanena yathā abhilaṣati tat darśayan āha atha vajrapāṇiḥ tathāgata tān sarva tathāgatān evam āha dṛṣṭāḥ bhagavantaḥ sarva

original: ana sarvatathāgato mahāvajradharaḥ tasya vajrajñānacaryā svasamāpattisukhānu- bhavanenaiva sarvasattvānāṃ samāpattisukhāṅgīkaraṇamiti |
analyzed: sarva tathāgataḥ mahā vajra dharaḥ tasya vajra jñāna caryā sva samāpatti sukha anu bhavanena eva sarva sattvānām samāpatti sukha aṅgīkaraṇam iti

original: evaṃ bhagavato vajrajñānacaryā anubhūya punaḥ samāpattervyutthāya yathā prahṛṣṭa- manaso bhagavantamabhilapanti taddarśayannāha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ yoṣidbhageṣva- saptadaśapaṭalaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyā bhiniṣkramya bhagavantaṃ mahāvajrapāṇi sarvatathāgatādhipatimevamāhuḥ āścaryaṃ bhagavan, āścaryaṃ sugata yatra hi nāma rāgākṣarapadairbuddhabodhiranugantavyeti |
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ vajra jñāna caryāḥ anubhūya punar samāpatteḥ vyutthāya yathā prahṛṣṭa manasaḥ bhagavantam abhilapanti tat darśayan āha bhagavantaḥ sarva tathāgatāḥ saptadaśa paṭala ṣaṣ koṭi

original: yatra hi nāma yasmāt kāraṇāt rāgākṣarapadaiḥ rāgacaritaiḥ sarvairbuddhavodhiḥ mahāvajradharatānugantavyā prāptavyeti |
analyzed: yatra hi nāma yasmāt kāraṇāt rāga akṣara padaiḥ rāga caritaiḥ sarvaiḥ buddha vodhiḥ mahā vajradhara tā anugantavyā prāptavyā iti

original: • .. yadā tadāścaryamiti nāmāścaryavacanaṃ śrutvā teṣāṃ rāgādīnāṃ viśuddhipradarśanena saṃdehaṃ karoti, tatpradarśanāyāha atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatādhipatiḥ tān sarvatathāgatānevamāha [ mā] bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā evaṃ vadata |
analyzed: yadā tat āścaryam iti nāma āścarya vacanam śrutvā teṣām rāga ādīnām viśuddhi pradarśanena saṃdeham karoti tad pradarśanāya āha atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarva tathāgata adhipatiḥ tān sarva tathāgatān
tat kasmāt hetoḥ

original: khavajrasamaya tulyatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ na rūpaskandho na vedanāskandho na dhāturnāyatanaṃ na rāgo na dveṣo na moho na dharmo nādharma iti |
analyzed: kha vajra samaya tulya tvāt sarva dharmāṇām na rūpa skandhaḥ na vedanā skandhaḥ na dhātuḥ na āyatanam na rāgaḥ na dveṣaḥ na mohaḥ na dharmaḥ na adharmaḥ iti
khavajrasamayaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ tathāgataḥ tad tulya tvāt sarva dharmāṇām
mā evam vadatha iti niḥsaṃdeha karaṇam
na rūpa skandhaḥ ityādinā amum eva artham prapa cayati
atha te sarva tathāgatāḥ tūṣṇīm abhūvan iti

original: tathāgatoktaṃ sarvadharma- prabhāsvaratvaṃ vacanasamanantarameva sākṣāt kṛtvā tāmevānabhilāpyadharmatāṃ dhyāyantaḥ sthitā abhūvanniti vajrapadasyārthaḥ |
analyzed: tathāgata uktam sarva dharma prabhāsvara tvam vacana samanantaram eva sākṣāt kṛtvā tām eva anabhilāpya dharma tām dhyāyantaḥ sthitāḥ abhūvan iti vajra padasya arthaḥ

original: evaṃ guhyadeśanāṃ parisamāpya tadvineyasattvān tathāgateṣu yathā parīndayati taddarśayannāha atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ tān sarvatathāgatān bodhisattvāṃścā- mantrayate sma |
analyzed: evam guhya deśanām parisamāpya tad vineya sattvān tathāgateṣu yathā pari indayati tat darśayan āha atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ tān sarva tathāgatān bodhisattvān ca ā mantrayate sma
ārocayantu bhagavantaḥ sarva lokadhātuṣu idam sarva tathāgata kāya vā citta guhyam
tat kasmāt hetoḥ

original: bhavyā ime daśadiksaṃsthitā bodhisattvā asya dharmaparyāyasyeti |
analyzed: bhavyāḥ ime daśa diś saṃsthitāḥ bodhisattvāḥ asya dharmaparyāyasya iti
ārocayantu prakāśayantu sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta vajra guhyāḥ

original: dvividhamahāvajradharasamādhiḥ tatprakāśakaḥ tantrarājaśca asya dharmaparyāyasyedānīṃ bhavyatvaṃ rāgajavodhipadaprāpterbhājanatvāt |
analyzed: dvividha mahā vajradhara samādhiḥ tad prakāśakaḥ tantra rājaḥ ca asya dharmaparyāyasya idānīm bhavya tvam rāga ja vodhi pada prāpteḥ bhājana tvāt

original: evaṃ viṣayāsaktānāṃ sattvānāmasya tantrasya pātratvaṃ pradarśya anāgata- sattvānāṃ saṃprakāśanārthaṃ vajradharme dharmatantraṃ samarpayannāha atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarva- tathāgatādhipatiḥ vajradharmamāmantrayate sma |
analyzed: evam viṣaya āsaktānām sattvānām asya tantrasya pātra tvam pradarśya anāgata sattvānām saṃprakāśana artham vajra dharme dharma tantram samarpayan āha atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarva tathāgata adhipatiḥ vajra
udgṛhāṇa kula putra imam sarva tathāgata samaya tattvam
tvam hi sarva tathāgataiḥ sarva dharma īśvaraḥ iti abhiṣiktaḥ

original: atha vajradharmo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamastviti kṛtvā tūṣṇīmabhūditi |
analyzed: atha vajradharmaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ evam astu iti kṛtvā tūṣṇīm abhūt iti
asya ayam arthaḥ

original: imaṃ samājanayaṃ sarvatathāgatasamayatatvaṃ sarvatathāgataparamparā- yātaṃ samayamalaṅghanīyaṃ tattvaṃ kāyavākcittarahasyam idānīṃ mayā prakāśitaṃ tvamudgṛhāṇa manasi sthāpaya, yataḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ vairocanādibhiḥ sarvadharmagrantharūpā- pannāḥ deśanāḥ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanantapratibhānatvādīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ abhiṣiktaḥ anujñātaḥ |
analyzed: imam samājanayam sarva tathāgata samaya tatvam sarva tathāgata paramparā yātam samayam a laṅghanīyam tattvam kāya vāc citta rahasyam idānīm mayā prakāśitam tvam udgṛhāṇa manasi sthāpaya yatas
etat ca deśanāyām vāgvajrasya adhikārāt
yathā bhagavat vacanam aṅgīkṛtavān mahāsattvaḥ tūṣṇīm abhūt

original: tantrasamarpaṇānantaraṃ sarvatathāgatairanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kiṃ kṛtamityāha atha te sarvatathāgatāḥ trivajrasattvākṣareṣu kāyavākcittaṃ praveśayā- māsuḥ |
analyzed: tantra samarpaṇa anantaram sarva tathāgataiḥ anabhilāpya buddhakṣetra paramāṇu rajaḥ samaiḥ kim kṛtam iti āha atha te sarva tathāgatāḥ tri vajra sattva akṣareṣu kāya vāc cittam
etat uktam bhavati

original: sarve pañcakulīnāḥ nairmāṇikarūpāḥ anantāparyanta- buddhabodhisattvakrodharājādayaḥ vairocanāmitābhākṣobhyatvaṃ prāptā iti yāvat |
analyzed: sarve pañcakulīnāḥ nairmāṇika rūpāḥ ananta aparyanta buddha bodhisattva krodharāja ādayaḥ vairocana amitābha akṣobhya tvam prāptāḥ iti yāvat

original: tattra vairocanastathāgataḥ traidhātukakāyavajrasvabhāvo yathā taddarśayannāha atha bhagavān vairocanastathāgata ityādi |
analyzed: tat tra vairocanaḥ tathāgataḥ traidhātuka kāya vajra svabhāvaḥ yathā tat darśayan āha atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ tathāgataḥ ityādi

original: asmin tribhavālaye aṇḍajādīnā- muttamamadhyamādhamasattvarāśīnāṃ yaḥ kāyaḥ sa vairocana ityayamarthaḥ sarvannaidhātuka- kāyavajreṣu vijahāretyanena darśitaḥ |
analyzed: asmin tri bhava ālaye aṇḍaja ādīnām uttama madhyama adhama sattva rāśīnām yaḥ kāyaḥ sa vairocanaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ kāya vajreṣu vijahāra iti anena darśitaḥ
kāya vairocanayoḥ ādhāra ādheya tvena abhāvāt

original: tathaiva niṣpannāniṣpannakāyayorabhinnatāṃ prakāśayannāha sarvatathāgatakāyasamatāṃ māyopamatāmālambya tūṣṇīmabhūditi |
analyzed: tathā eva niṣpanna aniṣpanna kāyayoḥ abhinna tām prakāśayan āha sarva tathāgata kāya samatām māyā upama tām ālambya tūṣṇīm abhūt iti

original: evaṃ taidhātuke sattvānāṃ yā vāk so'mi- tābha ityayamarthaḥ |
analyzed: evam taidhātuke sattvānām yā vāc saḥ mi tābhaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ
atha vāgvajraḥ tathāgataḥ sarva traidhātuka vāgvatreṣu vijahāra iti anena darśitaḥ
evam eva sarva sattvānām yat cittam tat akṣobhyaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ

original: atha vajrapāṇistathāgataḥ sarvatraidhātukacittavajñeṣu vijahāretyanena vajrapadena darśitaḥ |
analyzed: atha vajrapāṇiḥ tathāgataḥ sarva traidhātuka citta vajñeṣu vijahāra iti anena vajra padena darśitaḥ

original: sarvatathāgatānāṃ yaccittaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca yaccittamekameveti darśayannāha sarvatathāgatacittasamatāṃ satyadvayaikatāmālambya tūṣṇīmabhūditi paryantamāha guru- pādaprasādāt |
analyzed: sarva tathāgatānām yat cittam sarva sattvānām ca yat cittam ekam eva iti darśayan āha sarva tathāgata citta samatām satya dvaya ekatām ālambya tūṣṇīm abhūt iti paryantam āha guru pāda

original: tantre arthanayadharmatāyāmapagatasaṃśaya[:] anyatamaḥ kaścit saṃśayo me |
analyzed: tantre artha naya dharmatāyām apagata saṃśaya anyatamaḥ kaścid saṃśayaḥ me

original: ṣaṭ- koṭivyākhyānavahirmukhā mantriṇo yathārutadeśanāpāṭhamāśritya svakīyācāryāmnāyena pañcākārābhisaṃbodhikrameṇa candravajrakrameṇa bhavotpattikrameṇa vā parikalpita- devatāyogamabhyasyanti |
analyzed: ṣaṭ koṭi vyākhyāna vahirmukhāḥ mantriṇaḥ yathāruta deśanā pāṭham āśritya svakīya ācārya āmnāyena pañca ākāra abhisaṃbodhi krameṇa candra vajra krameṇa bhava utpatti krameṇa vā parikalpita

original: pariśuddhadevatāyogastu sarvakalpanātītaḥ pratyātmavedyaḥ buddhagocaraḥ skandharatnakaraṇḍāntargataḥ sadasatpakṣarahitaḥ vyañjanānusāriṇāṃ
analyzed: pariśuddha devatā yogaḥ tu sarva kalpanā atītaḥ pratyātma vedyaḥ buddha gocaraḥ skandha ratna karaṇḍa antargataḥ sat asat pakṣa rahitaḥ vyañjana anusāriṇām
tārkikāṇām ca aviṣayaḥ kevala guru upadeśa gamyaḥ

original: īdṛgvidhadevatātattvaṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte vajrapāṇyā[di]saṃgītikāra[1]ṇāmapyabhāve paścime kāle buddhasaṃpradāyakaṃ ko'sau pravartayatyavicchedena vineyajanasantāne kathaṃ pravartate ?
analyzed: īdṛgvidha devatā tattvam tathāgate parinirvṛte vajrapāṇi ādi saṃgīti kāra ṇām api abhāve paścime kāle buddha saṃpradāyakam pravartayati avicchedena vineya jana santāne katham pravartate

original: saptadaśapaṭalaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyā āha imamanāgatārthaṃ mañjuśrībhaṭṭārako'pi 'laṅkāvatārasūtre tathāgataṃ pari- pṛṣṭavān
analyzed: saptadaśa paṭala ṣaṣ koṭi vyākhyā āha imam anāgata artham mañjuśrī bhaṭṭārakaḥ pi laṅkāvatāra sūtre tathāgatam pari pṛṣṭavān
tat iha avatāryate
pratyātma vedyam jñānam te tārkikāṇām agocaram
iti

original: paścātkāle gate nātha brūhi ko dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: paścātkāle gate nātha brūhi kaḥ dhārayiṣyati
nirvṛte sugate paścāt kāla atītaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: mahāmati nibodha tvaṃ yo netrīn dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: mahāmati nibodha tvam yaḥ netrīn dhārayiṣyati
dakṣiṇāpatha vaidalyām bhikṣuḥ śrīmān mahā yaśāḥ
śrī nāgārjuna ca
prakāśya loke mahat yānam mahā yānam anuttaram
āsādya bhūmi muditām yāsyate sau sukhāvatīm

original: tadanenānukrameṇa tathāgate parinivṛte'pi yāvalloke saddharmo sthātā tāvad vajrayāne mahāyogatantrāgamamāśritya utpattikramānupūrveṇa niṣpannakramādhigama :
analyzed: tat anena anukrameṇa tathāgate parinivṛte pi yāvat loke saddharmaḥ sthātā tāvat vajrayāne mahā yoga tantra āgamam āśritya utpatti krama anupūrveṇa niṣpanna krama adhigama

original: `śrīnāgārjunabhaṭṭārakapādādārabhya nidhānamiva guruparvakrameṇa guruvaktrāt sāmājikā- nāmasmin janmani buddhatvabhājanānāṃ santāne saṃkrāmati
analyzed: śrī nāgārjuna bhaṭṭāraka pādāt ārabhya nidhānam iva guru parva krameṇa guru vaktrāt sāmājikāḥ nāma asmin janmani buddhatva bhājanānām santāne saṃkrāmati
evam śrī nāgārjuna pāda bhaṭṭāraka anuprāpta svaka arthaḥ

original: pratyātmavedyaṃ mahāvajradharasamādhiṃ loke pratipādya devamanuṣyasukhamatikramya tīrthikaśrāvakapratyekavuddhadhyānasamādhisamāpatti sukha- matikramya utpādabhaṅgarahitaṃ sarvākā ravaropetamāsecanakavigrahaṃ daśavalavaiśāradyādi- buddhālaṅkṛtaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ pratilabhya sukhāvatīṃ gatvāṣṭaguṇaiśvaryānvito viharati
analyzed: pratyātma vedyam mahā vajradhara samādhim loke pratipādya deva manuṣya sukham atikramya tīrthika śrāvaka pratyekavuddha dhyāna samādhi samāpatti utpāda bhaṅga rahitam sarva ākāra vara upetam āsecanaka

original: evaṃ vyākṛtāvyakṛtavikalpamapanīya svabhāvajñasyeha paratna paryavasānaṃ niści- tyedānīṃ tantramupasaṃharati evamityādinā
analyzed: evam vyākṛta avyakṛta vikalpam apanīya svabhāva jñasya iha paratna paryavasānam niści idānīm tantram upasaṃharati evam ityādinā

original: sakalatantraṃ saptavidhālaṅkārā- khyāyikānyāyena śrutvā arthanayadharmatāmadhigamya kramadvayopadeśādānapūrvakaṃ śrotṛbhyaḥ saṃprakāśyārakṣārthaṃ parisamāpayannānmanaḥ pratijñāśayaṃ saṃprakāśayan saṃgītikṛdāha idamavocaditi
analyzed: sakala tantram saptavidha alaṅkārā khyāyikā nyāyena śrutvā artha naya dharmatām adhigamya krama dvaya upadeśa ādāna pūrvakam śrotṛbhyaḥ saṃprakāśya ārakṣa artham pratijñā āśayam saṃprakāśayan

original: idaṃ guhyasamājatantranayamavocat prakāśita- vān mahāvajradharo mahāsukhaḥ
analyzed: idam guhya samāja tantra nayam avocat mahā vajradharaḥ mahā sukhaḥ

original: sarvatathāgatānāṃ kāyavākcittarahasyamuddiśya pravṛtto `guhyānāṃ samājaḥ samūho yasmiṃstasmin guhyasamāje tantrarāje sarva- tathāgatasamayasaṃvaravajrādhiṣṭhānarājo nāma paṭala iti
analyzed: sarva tathāgatānām kāya vāc citta rahasyam uddiśya pravṛttaḥ guhyānām samājaḥ samūhaḥ yasmin tasmin guhya samāje tantra rāje sarva tathāgata samaya saṃvara vajra adhiṣṭhāna rājaḥ nāma paṭalaḥ

original: sarvatathāgatāḥ vai- rocanādayaḥ teṣāṃ samayo'nuṣṭheyārthaḥ rakṣaṇādipañcasaṃvaraḥ pratipattiḥ tathāgata- kulādipañcakaṃ tadadvayamalaṅghanīyatvād vajraṃ tasyādhiṣṭhānaḥ rājo mahāvajradharaḥ guhyasamājapradīpodyotane sarvakuśalātmakaḥ anādinidhanaḥ ādibuddhaḥ mahāvidyāpuruṣamūrtiḥ jñānamūrtiḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvarātmakaḥ trilokātmakaḥ triyānātmakaḥ trivajrātmakaḥ satya- dvayātmakaḥ ityādi paṣṭhatathāgatasyānanto nāmaparyāyaḥ
analyzed: sarva tathāgatāḥ vai rocana ādayaḥ teṣām samayaḥ nuṣṭheya arthaḥ rakṣaṇa ādi pañca saṃvaraḥ pratipattiḥ tathāgata kula ādi pañcakam tat advayam a laṅghanīya tvāt vajram tasya
tad pratipādakaḥ śeṣa grantha sandarbhaḥ pūrvavat
paṭalam iva paṭalaḥ

original: paṭkoṭiyuktirahitaḥ khalu yogatantre vedyo'tivakti sugatasya vaco'tisūkṣmam
analyzed: paṣ koṭi yukti rahitaḥ khalu yogatantre sugatasya vacaḥ ti sūkṣmam

original: tattvaṃ na paśyati hi so'kṣaramātradarśī candraṃ didṛkṣuriva cāṅgulimīkṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: tattvam na paśyati hi saḥ kṣara mātra darśī candram didṛkṣuḥ iva ca aṅgulim īkṣamāṇaḥ
bhūyobhiḥ jana puṅgavaiḥ viracitam ṣaṣ koṭi māgam cirāt yena attra akhila tantra nīti vivṛtiḥ vyākhyāya tantran tu imam

original: yatprāptaṃ kuśalaṃ mayā ciramiyaṃ ṭīkā pradīpojjvalā stheyā tena ca satsukhaṃ padavaraṃ bhūyājjagaccandradhīḥ
analyzed: yat prāptam kuśalam mayā ciram iyam ṭīkā pradīpa ujjvalā stheyā tena ca sat sukham pada varam bhūyāt jagaccandra dhīḥ
iti pradīpa uyotana ṭīkāyām saptadaśa paṭale paṭkoṭi vyākhyā
samāptā ca iyam pradīpa uddyotana ṭīkā

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ
deya dharmaḥ yam pravara mahāyāna yāyinaḥ śrāmaṇeraka guṇa ākara pālasya

original: yadatra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatvācāryopādhyāya mātāpitṛpūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā sakala sattvarāśeranuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti
analyzed: yat atra puṇyam tat bhavatu ācārya upādhyāya mātā pitṛ pūrvaṅgamam kṛtvā sakala sattva rāśeḥ anuttara jñāna phala avāptaye iti
śubham astu
parameśvara parama saugata mahā rāja
śubham astu sarva sattvānām
yā anyasyāḥ vṛtavyā tantrā antimam
